Alright, the 3in1 is not a virus, PLEASE LEARN WHAT A VIRUS IS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

When your virus protection (let's use AVG as an example) says something in a torrent is a virus (let's say trojan) there is a HIGH probability it is "lying."  A 3in1 is a hacking tool (give or take), a trojan is a hacking virus, so obviously AVG would think it is a virus.  This hacking tool is not used to hack your computer, it is used to hack the game.  Because it has the same scripts as a hacking program, AVG will read it as a virus.  

THIS DOES NOT MEAN IT'S A VIRUS PEOPLE!!!!

If there is a virus on a torrent submitted to Pirate Bay, you can be sure THEY WILL REMOVE IT.  After one person claims a virus is on a torrent, it will be checked and if it does contain a harmful program it will be removed.  This torrent has been here for almost a year now, THERE IS NO FUCKING VIRUS SO SHUT THE FUCK UP.

You will not be able to use the 3in1 unless you turn off your virus protection or allow it.  It will give you an error if you don't saying you do not have permission.  Copy the 3in1 into the game directory then use it.  I pray to God you know what to do from there.  If you don't, then may God take your gene pool out of the human evolution chain.  The world will be far better off without the stupid.

But of course, who could we laugh at? lol  You have no idea how hard I laughed when I read BOOZ's comment, lol.  The stupid never learn, just bitch and moan.  Probably because they actually have to do it themselves instead of asking mommy to do it for them like they did on their High School homework, lol.

You know, Google works wonders.  Taking the time to look something up, maybe on other sites that host this torrent.  You learn a lot from just doing simple research, people.  LEARN FOR ONCE!!!! 

:D

Just remembered the step by step guide when installing this, to use the 3in1, disable your virus protection (AVG you can use it in the Tool settings and go down to the bottom to click on Temporary Disable).  Copy the 3in1 into the directory of the game, run as Admin, hit 1 when the black cmd box comes up, then you're done.  No need to type the serial code because it does it automatically (note why no-one posted one).
